Text:
Thanks as always... 
I feel kinda greedy, but I'd have a humble request (several, actually):

First, I am looking for the works of Humberto Ramos and some of Carlos Meglia's and Francisco Herrera's work with him. 
Specifically from Ramos: Crimson, Out There, Spectacular Spiderman, Revelations;
Herrera: Kamikaze, Soulfire: New World Order, 
Meglia: Star Wars: Underworld: The Yavin Vassilika;

I'm also looking for a collected Wolverine: Enemy of the State by Millar and Romita Jr.

And, lastly, for collected story-lines in general, like X-Men Messiah Complex and the following X-Men events, Hulk (by Loeb), War of the Hulks (or was that World War Hulks?). I'd also love to get my hands on a collected one-file Freak Angels by Warren Ellis (for those who don't know that, it's a FREE weekly web-comic, check at www.freakangels.com).

Yeah, I know... Just... asking and hoping. Keep up the good work. All you guys.

@Uriz3n - The majority of the comics you requested are already on TPB - a simple
search and they pop-up..??

Found by search already on TPB:
Freak Angels/World War hulk/Crimson/revelations/spectacular spiderman/Xmen Messiah
complex

Wolverine Enemy of the State:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6572955/WOLVERINE_-_ENEMY_OF_THE_STATE

Star Wars Underworld Yavin Vassilika:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6278792/Star_Wars_Comics_ColleCTiON#filelistContainer
And many other SW Comic Collection on TPB

Uriz3n - try this torrent for your marvel fix

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6164385/Huge_Marvel_Comics_Collection

Well... uhm... I'll go stand in the corner a bit... embarrassed. 

but... well... in my defense, Crimson and Revelations are almost dead with no seeders. And I was looking for that Fall of the HulkS and World War HulkS, you know, the Rulk and A-Bomb and that stuff that started in the Loeb/McGuiness series. But I found that somewhere else.

But thanks. Again.
thanks mate. you put up great stuff.
